name: Notion Idea Manager
description: Store all your ideas in one place with Notion TemplateNew ideas are constantly buzzing in your head, but when the time comes, you can't remember most of them?Use Notion Idea Manager to store all your ideas in one place. Write, organize and revisit in a matter of clicks.What you’ll get:A space to write all your ideas in one placeA space to group all of them into different topicsWith this Notion Template, you’ll be able to manage and organize your ideas for future possibilities.FAQs:1. What is Not
features: A space to write all your ideas in one place; A space to group all of them into different topics
